message.body: Hey Nic I've been meaning to ask you: hows posse going?
Pretty good. It's sort of tedious though :(
Like the stuff they have us doing is a waste of time, all these discussions and shit
Yeah basically. And every week we talk about something different
Oh yeah there's like weekly meetings and shit right? Are the other kids cool?
That's cool. But yeah i can imagine it being tedious as well
